scripts.//: The first three ones are for development enviroment through start command, while the last four command will be executed through build:css command once will send the project to productive enviroment ,watch:sass -> compile all sass files code into a css file code called style.css. devserver check for any change on sass files to reflec it at the moment. start is used in development enviroment and execute at the same time watch:sass and devserver task, each time we save a new change, page reload . compile:sass -> Convert all scss files to css file called style.comp.css . concat:css -> Join or put together css files, in this case icon-font.css and style.comp.css . prefix:css -> set automatically -webkit- prefix to maintain compability with last 10 versions of all web browser in file style.prefix.css . compress:css -> Minified o compress all css into the file style.css, i dont call it style.min.css because of name convection on this proyect . build:css -> execute all previus steps
